name: Florida Cancer Specialists & Research Institute LLC

narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Florida Cancer Specialists & Research Institute LLC is a Internal Medicine  Medical Oncology provider based in Cape Coral, FL. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $63.3M in Medicaid payments across 1.2M claims.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $63.3M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
